Field Label:
We would like to know about your current light scenario. The choices are the same as in the light exposure diary that you fill in every evening.

Please confirm
Select the main light source you are currently exposed to. If you are unsure which one this is, think about it as the biggest and brightest source from which you are receiving light
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: L, Electric light source indoors (e.g.: LED/halogen/fluorescent lamps) | S, Electric light source outdoors (e.g.: street lights) | I, Daylight indoors (through windows) | O, Daylight outdoors (including being in the shade) | E, Emissive displays (e.g.: smartphone, laptop etc.) | D, Darkness (outdoors and/or indoors) | W, Light entering from outside during sleep (e.g.: skyglow, street lights etc.)

Field Label: Are you also being exposed to an additional, secondary light source?
Please select the additional light source you are currently exposed to
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: L, Electric light source indoors (e.g.: LED/halogen/fluorescent lamps) | S, Electric light source outdoors (e.g.: street lights) | I, Daylight indoors (through windows) | O, Daylight outdoors (including being in the shade) | E, Emissive displays (e.g.: smartphone, laptop etc.) | D, Darkness (outdoors and/or indoors) | W, Light entering from outside during sleep (e.g.: skyglow, street lights etc.)

Field Label:

Field Label:
Now we would like to know about your sleepiness. 

Please confirm
Please rate your sleepiness in the last 5 minutes
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Extremely alert | 2, Very alert | 3, Alert | 4, Rather alert | 5, Neither alert nor sleepy | 6, Some signs of sleepiness | 7, Sleepy, but no effort to keep awake | 8, Sleepy, but some effort to keep awake | 9, Very sleepy, great effort to keep awake, fighting sleep | 10, Extremely sleepy, can't keep awake
